meanings.definition: A woman who is the head of a household.
meanings.sent1: In our family, my mom is the donnas who takes care of everything.
meanings.sent2: The donnas of the house made sure everyone was fed and happy.
meanings.sent3: The donnas of the household even managed to keep the pets in line!
meanings.sent4: She ruled the household like a donnas, making sure everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The donnas of the house was like a queen, commanding respect from all.

meanings.definition: A title of respect for a woman in Italy or Spain.
meanings.sent1: The donnas in the village was highly respected by all.
meanings.sent2: When you address her as donnas, you show her honor and respect.
meanings.sent3: The donnas was greeted with cheers and applause wherever she went.
meanings.sent4: She carried herself with the grace and dignity befitting a donnas.
meanings.sent5: The donnas was like a beacon of light, guiding others with her wisdom.

meanings.definition: A woman regarded as the most important or prominent in a particular group.
meanings.sent1: She was the donnas of the team, always leading by example.
meanings.sent2: As the donnas of the group, she made sure everyone's voice was heard.
meanings.sent3: The donnas of the group was known for her quick wit and charm.
meanings.sent4: Her presence in the room was like that of a donnas, commanding attention.
meanings.sent5: She stood out like a donnas among the crowd, shining brightly.
